fields.name: signal_phase_id
fields.description: Optional. Foreign key, the associated sigal phase.

fields.name: signal_phase_num
fields.description: Optional. Redundant with the record in the signal_phase table.

fields.name: min_green
fields.description: Required. The minimum green time in seconds for an actuated signal. Green time in seconds for a fixed time signal.

fields.name: max_green
fields.description: Optional.The maximum green time in seconds for an actuated signal; the default is minimum green plus one extension

fields.name: extension
fields.description: Optional. The number of seconds the green time is extended each time vehicles are detected.

fields.name: clearance
fields.description: Required. Yellow interval plus all red interval

fields.name: walk_time
fields.description: Required if have ped phase. If a pedestrian phase exists, the walk time in seconds

fields.name: ped_clearance
fields.description: Required if have ped phase. If a pedestrian phase exists, the flashing donâ€™t walk time.
